thread.title: College students say it is easy to obtain stimulants without a prescription and believe they are "smart drugs"

title: College students say it is easy to obtain stimulants without a prescription and believe they are "smart drugs"
text:
College students say it is easy to obtain stimulants without a prescription and believe they are "smart drugs" 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Today 
Seven out of 10 college students who use stimulants without a prescription say the drugs are easy to obtain - mostly from friends, according...
